short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a new motivational quote every day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Daily Motivational Quotes extension is a simple yet powerful tool designed to bring daily inspiration and positivity to your browsing experience. Every time you open the extension, you are greeted with a new motivational quote, aimed at uplifting your spirits, boosting your productivity, and helping you stay focused on your goals.
